document_data.caption: A map showing Cymrych Hugh's burial site near Blackstone.
document_data.name: Cairn of Cymrych Hugh
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cairn of Cymrych Hugh''' was the resting place of the first High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]], [[Cymrych Hugh]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|23-31}}
document_data.Location: The burial mound was found near the mining town of [[Blackstone]] within the [[Fairheight Range]] of northern [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]].
